skills.name: Severing Slash
skills.description: [SP: 15][CD: 14s] Deploys the weapon to automatically slash enemies within range 3 times per second for the next 6s, with each hit dealing 900 Physical DMG and weakening enemies, reducing their ATK by 50% for 5s.

skills.name: Deathly Scythe
skills.description: Attacks against weakened enemies gain 35% Total DMG Multiplier.
